column5: 25 going on 26 INFP female and your post is comforting. I don't have my career figured out right now and don't know what to do with myself. I google different professions hoping to find something that speaks to me, is fulfilling, that makes financial sense and is needed in today's job market.

I‚Äôm 25, an only child too, daughter, and all my extended family lives far away. I‚Äôm the only one my parents have for Christmas too, and I also feel discouraged. The holidays always remind me of everything I wanted to accomplish by the end of the year. To make it worse, I live with my parents so it is impossible for me to put on an extended front. Reading this thread and knowing that others are in similar situations and feel the same way, made me feel better. I hope everyone has a Merry Christmas. üéÑ‚ù§Ô∏è
